description:
From our law office in Lancaster, Pennsylvania, the legal professionals at Atlee Hall Attorneys at Law provide unmatched advocacy and support to clients throughout York and Lancaster counties and across central Pennsylvania who have serious and pressing legal challenges involving any of the following:

·Medical malpractice

·Products liability

·Defective automobiles

·Automobile and tractor-trailer accidents

·Liquor liability

·Autonomous vehicle and self-driving car accidents

·Sexual assault and abuse

·Hernia mesh issues

Backed by our more than 125 years of combined legal experience, our law firm's attorneys possess the extensive skills and resources necessary to handle your matter efficiently, and we have achieved a long record of successful results for those we have served. Over the course of our more than 30 years in practice, our firm has recovered substantial settlements and verdicts for our plaintiff clients, including the largest medical malpractice verdict ever awarded in York County as well as the largest personal injury verdict ever in Lancaster County.

We have achieved this level of success by thinking outside the box and devising innovative, creative approaches to help our clients recover the maximum amount of compensation they deserve. Honored for our impeccable professionalism and outstanding service to our clients, our attorneys have earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from our peers along with numerous testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients.

As leaders in our field, we have conducted lectures and seminars across our region and throughout the country on a variety of legal topics, so you can trust you will receive the highest level of advice possible for your legal matter.

To find out more about how we can best assist you with securing the finances you need during this difficult and uncertain time in your life, you can contact Atlee Hall Attorneys at Law by calling our law office or visiting our website to schedule a free, no-obligation case evaluation.
